purpose: The email invites submissions for the 21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025), which will take place at the Indian Institute of Technology Indore from December 16–20, 2025. It highlights the conference as a premier international forum for researchers, academicians, and industry professionals to share findings in cybersecurity and related fields. Important dates for submissions and notifications are provided, along with a link to the official conference website for further details.

infos:
